OOC: Hehe Cyberwolf, don't forget there is also a neautral bounty hunter(Qu=
atro) there.  And watch out, the Terrorcons can form Abominus anytime!
::Cu=
tthroat/Triggerhappy/Bodicons/Composer/Quatro::

    Cutthroat is suddenly =
blinded by smoke.  He waved it away, and was enraged.

    "Cutthroat slag =
Autobot trash buckets!!!!" Cutthroat yelled.

    Cutthroat shot a big stre=
am of flame from his mouth at the CF.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~
      Triggerhappy cackled, then fired a compressed air shot from Bl=
owpipe at the CF.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      The Bod=
icons saw this "Alliance" coming to help the Maximals.

      "COMBINE!!!!!=
!!!" Decapitron yelled.

      The other 4 Bodicons got close to Decapitron=
.  Then, their bodies all got into the right positions and they formed a hu=
ge gestalt warrior called Surgital.

       "It's time for your operation!!=
!!" Surgital yelled down at the Alliance members.

       The Bodicons all =
agreed on a target.  Surgital's hand converted into a massive spinning saw.=
  He lowered his hand down and attempted to cut Megaton in half.
~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Composer eventually arrived at the=
 scene.  He landed beside Zardus.

       "My leader, I'm here to help you =
aid the Maximals.  Wheeljack is coming as well," Composer informed Zardus o=
f his arrival.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Quatro cou=
ld hear the battle all around him.  Quatro went outside and saw the gestalt=
 warrior Surgital, and the Alliance coming to help Maximals.

      "The Ma=
ximals and their allies can fend off the Decepticons by themselves.  I've g=
ot a feeling that this is a big trick.  I have to see Megatron," Quatro sai=
d to himself.

      Quatro ran around, trying to be stealthy so that nobod=
y could see him.  He didn't want to waste power on using his stealth mode h=
ere.  Then, when he was away from the battle, he did a data search on the D=
ecepticons to try and find their base. 

       "Decepticon Base:Dark Avian=
," Quatro said aloud.

       Quatro transformed to hoverbike mode, and spe=
eded off towards the Dark Avian.
